metadata.title: CVE-2016-3659 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
SQL injection vulnerability in graph_view.php in Cacti 0.8.8.g allowsremote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via thehost_group_data parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3659` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8f+ds1-4ubuntu4.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.8f+ds1-4ubuntu4.16.04.2').
